roleset.name: in need of careful handling

role.descr: stimulus, what arg1 is touchy about

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8.

example.name: arg1
example.text: He states that it is quite touchy , almost painful with walking .

example.name: both args
example.text: I could tell she was touchy about certain subjects with the way she spoke and her body language

roleset.name: handsy, unable to resist

role.descr: entity who wont' stop touching things

roleset.note: Added by Julia. Relation to touch.01.

example.name: arg0
example.text: At this she was a bit annoyed, he was too touchy and she didn't like the way it felt a bit possessive.
